General.Name: Holike
General.Description: Guangzhou Holike Creative Home Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of home customization solutions in China. It offers integrated wardrobes, cloakrooms, bookcases, TV cabinets, wine cabinets, tatami mats, kitchens, customized wooden doors and windows, balconies, and other supporting products. Guangzhou Holike Creative Home Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
